      • getTransientsPath

        @Nonnull
public String getTransientsPath()
        Description copied from class: AssetHandle
        The path where transient renditions of this will be stored. This path is below "/var/composum/assets" and replicates the path of the asset with insertions of the version of the jcr:content node whereever there is one, to make sure an asset gets a new place whenever it would be rendered differently. For example, a rendition /content/foo/bar/somesite/assets/bloom.jpg/square/original/bloom/square/medium.jpg could get a AssetHandle.getTransientsPath() /var/composum/assets/content/foo/bar/somesite/{sitecfgversion}/assets/{assetscfgversion}/bloom.jpg/{ bloomcfgversion}/square/{squareoriginalversion}/medium with the UUIDs of the version of the jcr:content node in somesite, assets and bloom.jpg, and the version of the original of the square variation inserted at the appropriate place. If this isn't a staged version, we try to use the last modification time with prefix "workspace" instead.
        Specified by:
        getTransientsPath in class AssetHandle<AssetConfig>
